name: TOTAL-emission-constraint
comment: No fossils in 2050 in the modelled sectors.

name: BB-ch4-bpchp
comment: Keyword for electricity gas relation constraint. Leave empty to neglect the component in this constraint. Keywords of components powered by gas start with `config.settings.optimize.gas_key` and such powered with electricity with `config.settings.optimize.el_key` followed by `carrier` and `region` e.g. <`GAS_KEY`>-<carrier>-<region>.

Keywords of components powered by gas start with `config.settings.optimize.gas_key` and such powered with electricity with `config.settings.optimize.el_key` followed by `carrier` and `region` e.g. <`GAS_KEY`>-<carrier>-<region>.
